mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memId, memPw, memName, memEmail, memBirth, Gender, memHP, memZipcode, memAddress1, memAddress2, memImg, memJoy1, memJoy2, memJoinDate) VALUE(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memBirth}, #{Gender}, #{memHP}, #{memZipcode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memImg}, #{memJoy1}, #{memJoy2}, #{memJoinDate})
